components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.summary: VPC - eucanetd can use incorrect host-port when configuring router with multiple gateways

comments.body: Fix for 4.3.0 - concise test is green, so no regression for single gateway. Not tested for multiple gateways. A new ticket should be filed if a backport to 4.2 is needed.

Thanks [~tsugawa]
I currently have 2 systems each with 2 gateways to test this. I'll update with the results. 
I've opened EUCA-12094 to track any 4.2 work around this issue. 
Thanks!
-M

We've deployed may new clouds with multiple GWs and haven't seen this since. 
Closing.
